about_the_game:
Oh No! You broke your broom! Quick, make a bird potion so you can fly to the party tonight. But... you don't know how to make a bird potion.

Play 4 fun mini games to gather magic ingredients.



Make different potions and test them to see which animal you make.




With the help of your trusty pet cat, Guinea Pig, you need to make and test potions until you create a bird.

Play a rhythm music mini game to gather music magic - click the music notes as the fall in front of potion bottles to "Capture" the magic. Then mix it in to your cauldron to make a potion. Will it make a bird? Test it on Guinea Pig to find out.

Then play a catch the candy mini game - move your mouse side to side to catch candies in your bottle as they fall - then mix it in to your cauldron to make a potion. Will it make a bird?

Then play a "keep it up" mini game with a paper airplane - click underneath the airplane to launch it up in the air and try to collect the floating magic items scattered around to "Capture" the magic - Then mix it in to your cauldron to make a potion. Will it make a bird?

Then play a painting mini game. Follow the bumble bee around the canvas to paint a design. You can also paint whatever you'd like and you have a chance later in the game to paint again if you'd like, with a stencil! When you're done with the mini game, take this new ingredient and mix it in to your cauldron to make a potion. Will it make a bird?
